settings.html: The HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC delivers exceptional performance and adaptability, designed to efficiently handle a wide range of tasks. Featuring advanced technology and high-quality components, the HP Z4 G5 ensures smooth operation across various professional applications, including general radiology and mammography. Experience faster workflows and the capability to manage complex tasks with ease, allowing you to concentrate on your critical work. The expandable nature of the HP Z4 G5 provides flexibility to adapt as your needs evolve. Whether it's upgrading hardware or adding additional storage, the HP Z4 G5 adjusts to changing requirements, ensuring long-term productivity and efficiency. Investing in the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC empowers professionals across industries to fully realize the potential of their practice. Experience superior performance and enhanced workflow acceleration, helping you excel in your field. Rely on the power and reliability of the HP Z4 G5 to improve your workflows and boost your productivity.

settings.title: Exceptional Performance for Your Professional Needs
settings.description:
Experience top-tier performance with the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC. Featuring professional-grade GPUs and Intel Xeon W processors, the HP Z4 G5 is built to handle your most demanding tasks, excelling in rendering, simulations, and advanced data analysis, all while maintaining a quiet working environment.

The HP Z4 G5’s design prioritizes both power and tranquility, making it an ideal choice for high-performance professional settings, including radiology reading stations and mammography. Enjoy a seamless blend of performance and quiet operation, enhancing productivity without disruption.

settings.title: Upgrade, Expand, and Evolve with the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC
settings.description: Upgrade your workflow with the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC, designed for high performance and flexibility. This robust workstation supports up to two high-end GPUs, extensive memory options, and substantial storage capacity. It features two front-accessible NVMe bays and five PCIe 5.0 slots (backward-compatible with PCIe 4.0), ensuring you have the expandability needed for complex tasks. Its tool-less design allows for effortless upgrades and modifications, providing a hassle-free experience. Rely on the HP Z4 G5 to enhance your professional capabilities, seamlessly evolve your system, and tackle demanding projects with confidence. Trust in the HP Z4 G5 for superior performance and reliability to optimize your workflows and drive success.

settings.title: Silent Operation, Superior Performance
settings.description: Achieve peak PC performance without disruptive noise with the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC. Smart fan control ensures a whisper-quiet system by dynamically adjusting fan speeds in real-time through over 20 temperature sensors. Carefully designed vents and ducts optimize airflow and heat removal for efficient cooling. Upgrading to the HP Z4 G5 delivers exceptional performance while maintaining a tranquil working environment. Experience a powerful and silent solution tailored to meet your professional needs, providing the ideal balance between high-performance computing and a peaceful workspace. Elevate your work experience with a workstation that enhances both performance and productivity in a quiet, focused environment.

settings.title: Unleash Unthrottled Performance with Innovative Thermal Technology:
settings.description:
Discover exceptional performance without limitations with the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC. Innovative thermal technology keeps the processor and graphics card consistently cool, enabling them to operate at maximum performance without throttling. This ensures uninterrupted power and speed, allowing you to tackle demanding tasks with ease.

Upgrade to the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Tower PC and unlock the full potential of your work. Enjoy unthrottled performance that lets you push boundaries and achieve remarkable results in your field. Elevate your productivity and efficiency with the reliability and power of the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Tower PC.

settings.title: Professional Grade Graphics
settings.description: Maximize your creative potential with the HP Z4 G5, featuring high-performance GPU solutions that support up to two NVIDIA RTX, AMD Radeon Pro or Barco MXRT GPUs. Enhance your imaging capabilities, speed up rendering, and manage complex data with unparalleled efficiency. Designed for professionals seeking top performance, the Z4 G5 ensures seamless workflows and advanced visualization. Upgrade to these optimized GPU solutions to unlock your full potential and stay ahead in your field. The HP Z4 G5 delivers exceptional power and efficiency, allowing you to realize your creative visions and complete tasks with precision. Experience a new level of productivity and performance with its advanced GPU configurations.

settings.title: Optional Wi-Fi 6E Adapter
settings.description: Liberate your device from network cables and embrace the flexibility to work from virtually anywhere with optional Wi-Fi 6E, all without utilizing a PCIe slot. Experience the convenience of wireless connectivity, enabling increased mobility and adaptability for your device. The optional Wi-Fi 6E feature allows seamless connections without the constraints of physical cables, enhancing workspace versatility. Enjoy the freedom to move and work from different locations without sacrificing network speed and reliability. This wireless option makes your device more adaptable to various environments, providing the freedom and flexibility to work efficiently without traditional network connection limitations.

settings.title: Silent Operation, Superior Performance
settings.description: Achieve peak PC performance without disruptive noise with the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC. Smart fan control ensures a whisper-quiet system by dynamically adjusting fan speeds in real-time through over 20 temperature sensors. Carefully designed vents and ducts optimize airflow and heat removal for efficient cooling. Upgrading to the HP Z4 G5 delivers exceptional performance while maintaining a tranquil working environment. Experience a powerful and silent solution tailored to meet your professional needs, providing the ideal balance between high-performance computing and a peaceful workspace. Elevate your work experience with a workstation that enhances both performance and productivity in a quiet, focused environment.

settings.title: HP Z4 G5 - Thunderbolt™ 4 Technology
settings.description:
Unlock lightning-fast data transfers and elevate your productivity with Thunderbolt™ 4 technology from the HP Z4 G5 workstation. Seamlessly transfer large files with two optional USB3.2 SuperSpeed Type-C connectors, boasting impressive transfer rates of up to 20Gbps.

Experience smooth and reliable communication between devices with two ports of 10 GbE network connection, promoting enhanced collaboration and productivity. Embrace cutting-edge connectivity solutions and achieve a new level of speed and performance in your professional endeavors with the HP Z4 G5. Empower your workflow and stay ahead with advanced technology at your fingertips.

settings.title: Lightning-Fast Memory Configurations
settings.description:
Unlock the true potential of your work with the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC, featuring ultra-fast memory configurations designed to revolutionize productivity. Experience exceptional performance in rendering, simulations, machine learning, and other memory-intensive tasks with up to 512 GB of DDR5 ECC memory. Accelerate processing power, handle complex data with ease, and achieve faster results, empowering you to stay ahead in your field.

Crafted to meet the demands of high-performance tasks, the HP Z4 G5 ensures exceptional outcomes for every project. Optimize your workflow, unlock ultimate performance, and tackle new challenges confidently with the advanced memory configurations of the HP Z4 G5. Upgrade your workstation and elevate your productivity to new heights.

settings.title: Unleash Unthrottled Performance with Innovative Thermal Technology:
settings.description:
Discover exceptional performance without limitations with the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Desktop PC. Innovative thermal technology keeps the processor and graphics card consistently cool, enabling them to operate at maximum performance without throttling. This ensures uninterrupted power and speed, allowing you to tackle demanding tasks with ease.

Upgrade to the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Tower PC and unlock the full potential of your work. Enjoy unthrottled performance that lets you push boundaries and achieve remarkable results in your field. Elevate your productivity and efficiency with the reliability and power of the HP Z4 G5 Workstation Tower PC.

settings.title: HP Anywhere
settings.description: Effortlessly harness the capabilities of your Z from any device with HP Anyware, a remote access software that ensures rapid responsiveness and high image quality. This versatile tool maintains optimal performance even during demanding tasks like film editing and data visualizations. With HP Anyware, experience the convenience of accessing your workstation's power remotely, allowing seamless collaboration and work on resource-intensive projects from different devices. Enjoy a responsive and visually rich remote computing experience, enhancing flexibility and efficiency in your professional workflow, regardless of your location or the device you use.

settings.title: Optional Wi-Fi 6E Adapter
settings.description: Liberate your device from network cables and embrace the flexibility to work from virtually anywhere with optional Wi-Fi 6E, all without utilizing a PCIe slot. Experience the convenience of wireless connectivity, enabling increased mobility and adaptability for your device. The optional Wi-Fi 6E feature allows seamless connections without the constraints of physical cables, enhancing workspace versatility. Enjoy the freedom to move and work from different locations without sacrificing network speed and reliability. This wireless option makes your device more adaptable to various environments, providing the freedom and flexibility to work efficiently without traditional network connection limitations.

settings.title: 3D Vapor Chamber Cooling
settings.description: The Premium CPU Cooler efficiently cools the processor while maintaining low noise levels at full performance. Its vapor chamber, containing a precisely measured liquid, is finely tuned for optimal power dissipation and temperature control. Advanced algorithms and sensors enhance both fan and vapor cooling, offering a more reliable solution than traditional liquid cooling systems with pumps and tubing. This innovative design ensures consistent temperature management and minimizes noise, delivering effective cooling without compromising processor performance.

settings.title: Professional Grade Graphics
settings.description: Maximize your creative potential with the HP Z4 G5, leveraging high-performance GPU solutions that support up to two NVIDIA RTX A6000 or AMD Radeon Pro W6800 GPUs. Elevate your imaging capabilities, expedite rendering, and achieve unparalleled efficiency in managing complex data, tailored for professionals pursuing top-notch performance and productivity. Stay at the forefront of your field with these purpose-built GPUs. Seamless workflows and advanced visualization capabilities ensure you can deliver outstanding outcomes. Upgrade your practice with our optimized GPU solutions, unlocking the true potential of your work today. The HP Z4 G5 empowers professionals with a cutting-edge workstation that combines exceptional power and efficiency, allowing you to realize your creative visions and accomplish tasks with precision and speed. Experience a new level of productivity and performance with the advanced GPU configurations of the HP Z4 G5.

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.description:
The HP Z4 G5 Workstation features a compact design, optimized for workspace versatility with its efficient dimensions and weight.

  1. Height: 17.5" (445 mm)
  2. Width: 6.65" (169 mm)
  3. Depth: 15.2" (386 mm)

    Weight: 27.8 lbs (12.6 kg)

settings.title: Front View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
1. Aluminum handle
2. Front I/O:
- Premium (shown): 2 x USB 3 Type-A (5 Gbps signaling rate) (1 Charging), 2 x USB 3 Type-C (20 Gbps signaling rate)
- Standard (not shown): 4 x USB 3 Type-A (5 Gbps signaling rate) (1 charging),
3. Media Card Reader (optional)
4. Power button
5. Combo audio jack
6. Optional 5.25" CRU carriers: 2x 3.5" HDD (one per bay) or 2x M.2
7. Drive bay lock (optional)

settings.title: Rear View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
8. Rear handle
9. Power connection
10. Power button
11. Audio line
12. Flex I/O module (optional)
13. 1GbE Ethernet standard ports
14. 6 x USB 3.1 Gen1 (5Gbs) Type-A connectors

With support for up to two high-end GPUs, extensive memory capacity, substantial storage, two front-accessible NVMe bays, and five PCIe 5.0 slots (compatible with PCIe 4.0), the HP Z4 G5 provides the flexibility and power needed for demanding tasks.

settings.title: 3D Vapor Chamber Cooling
settings.content: Efficiently cooling the processor while maintaining low acoustic levels at full performance, the vapor chamber in the Premium CPU Cooler contains a precisely measured amount of liquid, finely tuned for the system's power dissipation and temperature needs. Proprietary algorithms and sensors optimize both fans and vapor cooling, providing a more reliable solution compared to traditional liquid cooling systems involving pumps, tubing, and heat exchanges. This innovative approach ensures consistent and effective temperature management, promoting a reliable cooling system without compromising performance. The Premium CPU Cooler offers advanced cooling technology that efficiently balances temperature requirements while minimizing noise, providing a reliable solution for optimal processor performance.
